CustomField.description: The query must have the following syntax "Select Count(Id) fieldCount, <GroupByFieldName> fieldValue from <ObjectName> Group By<GroupByFieldName> Order By <FieldName>
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The query must have the following syntax "Select Count(Id) fieldCount, <GroupByFieldName> fieldValue from <ObjectName> Group By<GroupByFieldName> Order By <FieldName>
CustomField.label: Group By Query String
